level.heading: New housing or facilities; rated design capacity.
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 1802(b) of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-105, June 20, 2003, 50 DCR 5613).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 1802(b) of Fiscal Year 2004 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-149, September 22, 2003, 50 DCR 8360).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-43, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 24-201.41.
